title: Randomly disconnected from games
body:
So every now and then, i get randomly kicked from games, this only usually happens sometime between 6-9 pm  and stops me from playing games for the rest of the night because i can't log back in. I get disconnected from chat and i'm losing games because of this. Can someone help? or at least explain why this happens only every once in a while.
Here is a link to what i'm seeing after i disconnect from the game,
And the link it sends me too doesn't help either, i have tried all of them and everything seems fine.
P.s This lockout of being able to get into the game goes from between locking me out till the end of one game to locking me out for a day.
thanks for reading
- Icy Lock

replies.body:
Have you tried contacting your ISP about this?

If your games work completely fine out of this 6-9pm period, that's their fault.
Do tell what the results are.

Dude why your are posting advertising links? Bad post. 

Just upload the image into the riot server and not post random phishing links.

Its meant to be a video,
Its not a random link, it was meant to show the issue :/
